sentences.sContent: Alexander and Gaius and Pompeius, what are they in comparison with Diogenes and Heraclitus and Socrates?
sentences.sContent_eng: Alexander and Gaius and Pompeius, what are they in comparison with Diogenes and Heraclitus and Socrates?
sentences.sCn: 亚历山大、盖耶斯和庞培与第欧根尼、赫拉克利特、苏格拉底比较起来是什么人呢？
